name: Sweet courage
description:
Sweet Courage is a game in which you have to play as a candy that bravely puts things in order in a sweet world. The bottom line is to clear all the damned islets without losing all your courage.


Stepping on an infected island character loses courage, and stepping on a clean one, the character replenishes replenishes his courage.

By clearing all infected sweets, you will win.

P.S. You dont able to move back. Brave lollipops only go forward!
